original_title: Péripéties et perfections des acteurs de l'Opéra de Pékin
overview: From an early age, the future actors of the Peking opera undergo intensive training to be able to interpret their roles once they become adults. Their ancestral art requires a perfect mastery of their body. In addition to acting, they must learn to sing, dance or even juggle. Later, the best of them will be chosen to join Peking Opera.
title: Péripéties et perfections des acteurs de l'Opéra de Pékin
